document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON RESCINDING ARTICLE XX OF ORDINANCE NO. 92-19, REGARDING ABANDONED, WRECKED, DISMANTLED OR INOPERATIVE VEHICLES, AND ENACTING A NEW CHAPTER 10.36 OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE REGARDING ABANDONED, WRECKED, DISMANTLED OR INOPERATIVE VEHICLES
